basics.name: Varnit Goyal
basics.label: Tech Lead
basics.summary: Highly accomplished lead engineer with a strong background in leading and mentoring teams of software engineers. Skilled in addressing intricate software engineering challenges and delivering impressive projects

work.name: Navi
work.description: Navi is an Indian financial services company founded by Sachin Bansal its goal is to simplify finance
work.summary: Delivering and architecting world class products.
highlights: Working on optimisation of Navi's lending journey for 0.5 million customers
Architected observability tools for UI which is being used by dozens of internal teams at Navi and helped us reduce MTTR by more than 50%
Architected and developed Navi collection portal and Field collection react native app which is helping us achieve 99.5% of collection efficiency
Architected and maintaining Most optimised Video kyc platform in world which is currently handling around 15000 VKYC per day .
Architected and maintaining chat support with bots and agents for navi handling 3 Lakhs tickets per month
Mentored a team of 12 engineers and facilitated the promotion of 3 SDEs to SDE2 and 2 SDE2s to SDE3

work.name: Razorpay
work.description: India's Leading payment gateway provider with more than 60 Billion total payment value
work.summary: Build world class product Razorpay X, which was used by the likes of Swiggy, Whatsapp, Flipkart
highlights: Got promoted to Senior Frontend Engineer in 6 months
Reports app, cohesive payouts, invoice app, storybook, service worker, offline mode
Revamp Razorpay X entire payout flow to make it more cohesive and smarter, which increased the conversion rate by 50%
Single-handedly created invoice app for Razorpay X
Single-handedly created Reports app for Razorpay X
Took initiative and implement service worker for Razorpay X which increased the loading time for webpage
Build the offline mode for Razorpay X
Optimise build time for Razorpay X
Helped in maintaining design system for Razorpay X

work.name: Tokopedia (Part of Gojek)
work.description: Tokopedia is the largest Indonesian E-commerce with more than 100 millions active users
work.summary: Worked as a Software engineer, architected and delivered world class products
highlights: Architected Hypnos which is their in house RUM monitoring system
Delivered full fledged verticals like toko member, tokopoints and optimise them for 100 million active users
Developed games for Tokopedia's sales campaign and optimise them to run at more than 60 FPS
Optimise Tokopedia's crucial web pages to score more than 90 in lighthouse
Wrote unit tests using jest and RTL for more than 75% of code coverage
Heavily worked on React, Redux, node, postgres, Jest and Graphql

work.name: To The New
work.description: TO THE NEW is a digital technology firm providing digital transformation and product engineering services to ISVs, Consumer Internet, and large enterprises across the globe.
work.summary: Worked as a fullstack developer mostly on React, Redux and node js
highlights: Worked for Tabcorp which is 2 largest betting company in Australia
Worked for Boston Bear develop games for their POS machines using service workers.
Worked on email unsubscribe mechanism for To the new marketing mails

awards.title: Navi Security hackathon
awards.summary: Won runner up award for navi security hackathon 2 times

projects.name: Cybertron
projects.description: In house Navi's observability platform for web
highlights: Architected observability tools for UI which is being used by 10s of internal teams at Navi and helped us reduce MTTR by more than 50%
Supports a logs, metrics and negative experiences through single SDK.

projects.name: Collections Portal/ Field React native app
projects.description: Architected and developed Navi's collection portal
highlights: One of the most sophisticated internal portal at Navi tailored for collections, helping us achieve 99.5% of CE one of the best in fintech industry
Developed react native app for field collection, achieved 99.5 error free users and optimised to run in low network conditions
Developed Inhouse calling SDK by reverse engineering vendor portals helped reduce errors and agent's experience

projects.name: Video KYC
projects.description: Architected and managing Video kyc process for Navi
highlights: Most optimised Video KYC process in world
Brought TAT per ticket to 65s
Brought abandonment due to system to 0%
Currently handling 10000 Video kyc on daily basis

projects.name: Customer Support
projects.description: Architected and managing chat, call and email support platform for Navi
highlights: currently handling 3 Lakhs chat support tickets per month
Brought average CSAT ratings to 3.9
Optimising for BOT so that most of the queries are answered by BOTS

projects.name: Razorpay X
highlights: Worked on Futuristic UI
Worked on cohesive payouts, made payout more intelligent and cohesive which increased the conversion rate by 50%
Implemented offline mode for Razorpay X
Implemented service worker for Razorpay X

highlights: optimise games to run on low end devices
optimise games to run at 60fps
